string-array.name: batman_quotes
string-array.item: Everyone has gone through some sort of struggle in their lives.
Everyone has fears. Conquering them is what matters.
It\'s okay if she doesn\'t love you back. Being there for that special person is what matters the most.
Have your own values and morals. It defines you as a person.
Everyone wears a mask. We only remove them in front of our loved ones.
There will always be someone who hasn\'t given up on you. Don\'t let them down, and never back down. Ever.
How will you learn to rise if you never fall?
Enemies are a necessity. You keep fighting, you keep learning. It helps you grow.
The climb might be steep, but you have to start somewhere.
In the end, there\'s always a way out.
May the spirit of Batman live on within you, forever.
